text:
A youth died of injuries sustained when he and his friend were trying to repair a damaged group house at Pallivasal Street at Kurumbal village near Tiruthuraipoondi in Tiruvarur district on Saturday. Ramesh whose house was damaged called his friend Ranjith (20) for help in mending the damaged portion of his group house when the roof collapsed on two injuring critically. Ranjith died on the spot while Ramesh was rushed to the hospital for treatment. Tiruthuraipoondi police ahve registered a case and are investigating.

406 bottles seized

A total of 406 IMFL bottles being clandestinely transported from Karaikal into Tiruthuraipoondi in a car were seized by the flying squad scanning vehicles for cash movement near Tiruthuraipoondi in Tiruvarur district on Saturday. The squad led by Panchayat Union Commissioner Balasubramanian was checking vehicles some distance from Tiruthuraipoondi when they intercepted the car carrying the contraband and upon search unearthed the bottles. The driver and owner of the car P. Jagadeesan (40) of Sivakkoollai Madukkur and handed over the person and the contraband to the PEW personnel.

House burgled

Thieves took away gold jewellery weighing six sovereigns from the house of a daily wage earner at Koothanallur in Tiruvarur district on Friday. The incident came to light when the worker returned home after the days work to find his house broken open. Based on a complaint from Tajunnisa (60) of Koothanallur, working in a paddy hulling mill, she had left for work on Friday morning and when she returned in the evening after work she found the backdoor broken open and the gold jewellery kept in the safe missing. She has preferred a complaint with the Taluk Police Office.
title: Youth dies in house collapse
